ygData.subject: Love and EQ!
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just thinking about the number of engagement rings out there, and was wondering about people s opinion on romance in EQ. I don t know about how many
ygData.messageBody:
I was just thinking about the number of
engagement rings out there, and was wondering about people's
opinion on romance in EQ. I don't know about how many
broken homes there are involved, but I do know of EQ
couples who were "married" in the game, while having
spouses in real life. There is, of course, quite a bit of
flirting in the game....but is it ever a problem? What do
you guys (and gals) think?<br><br>Blackwaite<br>17
season Paladin<br>Rotcet-nife
